message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take a smaller share, but I'll give you a chance to negotiate
Meet me in the middle, let's compromise!
You're getting close to my minimum, but I'm still holding out for more
I'm willing to compromise, but you need to meet me at this price!
I'm not budging much more, take it or leave it
I'm not going to give in to your lowball offer, meet me at this price or we're at an impasse!
You're really pushing your luck, this is my final offer
This is my final offer, take it or we'll be at an impasse and I'll walk away!
